text: aur jo kaamana kar rahe the usake sthaan kee kal, kahan lageh kya tum dekhate nahin ki allaah adhik kar deta hai jeevika, jisake lie chaahata ho apane daason mein se aur naapakar deta hai (jise chaahata hai). yadi hamapar upakaar na hota allaah ka, to hamen bhee dhansa deta. kya tum dekhate nahin ki kaafir (krtaghn) saphal nahin hote
